main.name: Kabir Hasan
main.bio: I describe myself as a passionate developer who loves coding, open-source, and web platform. I like to create and contribute to open-source projects. That helps me to learn a ton of new stuff and grow as a developer. Also, I enjoy writing technical things on my blog. In my free time, you can find me at the gym or on tech meetups and conferences.
main.contactmessage: Get in touch with me to receive further details.

resume.skillmessage: Here you can create a short write-up of your skills to show off to employers

education.description: Here I took my Bachelors of Computer Science with a Software Engineering Specialty and achieved a much more thorough education in the underlying theory, concepts, and science behind more complex programming. It was here that I discovered my passion for scalable application programming (web and mobile), the security behind computer and application systems, and found that I have a knack for understanding complex algorithms.
